Module com.bcs2024.knapsack
Package com.bcs2024.knapsack.algorithm

Class GreedyKnapsackSolver

java.lang.Object
com.bcs2024.knapsack.algorithm.GreedyKnapsackSolver
public class GreedyKnapsackSolver extends Object
GreedyKnapsackSolver implements a greedy algorithm to solve the knapsack problem. It attempts to place parcels within the cargo space based on a set of heuristics to maximize the total value of parcels placed.

  • Constructor Details

    • GreedyKnapsackSolver

      public GreedyKnapsackSolver()
      Constructs a new GreedyKnapsackSolver object for solving the knapsack problem using a greedy algorithm. This constructor initializes various properties, including weights, parcel sequence, and random initial values for weights. It also sets actualWeights with predefined values.

  • Method Details

    • putShapes

      private void putShapes()
      Places parcels within the cargo space based on their properties and available positions. This method iterates through the cargo space, considering each position and parcel type in the specified sequence. It calculates the suitability of each placement based on various factors and selects the best placement for each parcel.

    • solve

      public void solve()
      Solves the knapsack problem using a greedy algorithm by placing parcels within the cargo space. This method invokes the 'putShapes' method to place parcels optimally within the cargo space.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The main method for testing the GreedyKnapsackSolver by running it multiple times. This method creates instances of the GreedyKnapsackSolver and invokes the 'putShapes' method multiple times to solve the knapsack problem with a greedy algorithm for testing purposes.
      Parameters:
      args - Command-line arguments (not used).

    • touched

      public int touched(Parcel parcel, int[][][] matrix, int posX, int posY, int posZ)
      Returns the number of points touched by the parcel. This method returns the number of points touched by the parcel.
      Parameters:
      parcel - The parcel.
      matrix - The matrix representing the cargo space.
      posX - The x-coordinate of the parcel's position.
      posY - The y-coordinate of the parcel's position.
      posZ - The z-coordinate of the parcel's position.
      Returns:
      The number of points touched by the parcel.
